UNITED NATIONS- The U.N. Security Council has voted unanimously to deploy 2,000 additional peacekeepers to target="_blank" href="http://abidjanpost.com/"> Ivory Coast to bolster the 9,800-strong U.N. peacekeeping force until June 30. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon says U.N. peacekeepers face an openly hostile security target="_blank" href="http://environmentglobe.com/"> environment with threats from forces loyal to Laurent Gbagbo, who refuses to relinquish the presidency to Alassane Ouattara , internationally recognized as the legitimate Barack Obama .
